title: catandmouse
extract: Definition of cat and mouse. : behavior like that of a cat with a mouse: such as. a : the act of toying with or tormenting something before destroying it. b : a contrived action involving constant pursuit, near captures, and repeated escapes played a game of cat and mouse with the police broadly : an evasive action.Dec 5, 2018
extract_html: Definition of cat and mouse. : behavior like that of a cat with a mouse: such as. a : the act of toying with or tormenting something before destroying it. b : a contrived action involving constant pursuit, near captures, and repeated escapes played a game of cat and mouse with the police broadly : an evasive action.Dec 5, 2018
